text: On #Marr #Hancock literally rewriting history (talking bollocks) Denying the assertion that a vaccine would be available by Sept (Sharma) PM promise of “world leading” #TrackandTrace by June 1st. Throughout this terrible #COVID19 crisis he has over promised & undelivered
